types.section:
{{fr-adj}}

# {{demonym-adj|fr|[[Strasbourg]], a <<major city>>, the <<fpref>> of the <<dept:pref/Bas-Rhin>>, <<r/Grand Est>>, <<c/France>>}}
types.html:
strasbourgeois (feminine strasbourgeoise, masculine plural strasbourgeois, feminine plural strasbourgeoises)

  1. of, from or relating to Strasbourg, a major city, the prefecture of the Bas-Rhin department, Grand Est, France
trans: of, from or relating to Strasbourg, a major city, the prefecture of the Bas-Rhin department, Grand Est, France
